chunk.textFormat: Adjusting of the valves and engine brake

After this part you shall be familiar with the difference between Volvo engine brakes.
Adjustment of the engine brake shall be done together with adjusting of the other valves.
If the exhaust valves are not adjusted correctly, the adjustment for VEB, VEB+ and JAK is not going to be correct.
Read the service information for the correct way to adjust.
Adjusting of the valves and engine brake

Because of the extreme importance and need for care whilst carrying out adjustment combined with how easy it is to make an incorrect adjustment, each participant should carry out a complete adjustment for one cylinder under the watchful eye of the trainer. The following operations are included: alignment and set up of the camshaft markings, adjustment of the valve yoke, adjustment of the inlet valves, adjustment of the exhaust valves, adjustment of the unit injectors.
This information can be different depending on which engine you are working on. Show the participants the correct information.
